mapper.select: select eepcs.device_id as deviceId, eepcs.device_name as deviceName, eepcs.data_date_key as dataDateKey, IFNULL(eepcs.positive_active_energy,0) as electricityConsumption, IFNULL(emy.yield,0) as yield from ems_electric_power_consumption_statistics eepcs join ems_meter b on eepcs.device_id = b.meter_code left join ems_meter_yield emy on eepcs.device_id = emy.meter_code and eepcs.data_date_key = emy.data_month where eepcs.company_code = #{companyCode} and eepcs.data_type = #{temporalGranularity} and eepcs.data_date_key between #{qryStartTime} and #{qryEndTime} order by eepcs.data_date_key, b.sort

select eepcs.device_id as deviceId, eepcs.device_name as deviceName, eepcs.data_date_key as dataDateKey, IFNULL(eepcs.positive_active_energy,0) as electricityConsumption, IFNULL(emy.yield,0) as yield from ems_electric_power_consumption_statistics eepcs join ems_meter b on eepcs.device_id = b.meter_code left join ( select meter_code, SUBSTRING_INDEX(data_month, '-',1) as data_year, sum(yield) as yield from ems_meter_yield group by meter_code, data_year ) emy on eepcs.device_id = emy.meter_code and eepcs.data_date_key = emy.data_year where eepcs.company_code = #{companyCode} and eepcs.data_type = 'VD_Year' and eepcs.data_date_key between #{qryStartTime} and #{qryEndTime} order by eepcs.data_date_key, b.sort

SELECT a.device_name as deviceName, a.data_date_key as dateKey, ifnull(y.yield, 0) as yield, a.positive_active_energy as energy, IF( ifnull( y.yield, 0) = 0, 0, ROUND( a.positive_active_energy / ifnull( y.yield, 0 ), 2 )) as efficiency from ems_electric_power_consumption_statistics a left join ems_meter_yield y on a.device_id = y.meter_code and a.data_date_key = y.data_month where a.device_id = #{deviceId} and a.data_date_key BETWEEN #{qryStartTime} and #{qryEndTime} and a.data_type = #{temporalGranularity} ORDER BY a.data_date_key desc
